pkgmetadata.longdescription: This library provides a small cryptographic library that puts emphasis on the applicative style and ease of use. It includes basic ciphers (AES, 3DES, RC4, ChaCha20/Poly1305), AEAD primitives (AES-GCM, AES-CCM, ChaCha20/Poly1305), public-key primitives (RSA, DSA, DH), elliptic curves (NIST P-256, P-384, P-521, and curve 25519), and a strong RNG (Fortuna).
